entry.title: Forgive Yourself by Letting Yourself Love (and letting yourself be loved)
entry.summary:
Author: aviationisthere

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 86,089Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 755

Summary: When Bruce arrived at the cave, the first thing he heard was yelling. That wasn’t unusual so he didn’t think anything was out of the ordinary. That was until he parked Nightwing’s bike in its spot and he saw his children. He saw his children. They were children. Young children. “What the...” Bruce pulled off the helmet. He got off the bike and set the helmet down before pulling off his cowl. He walked over to the batmobile which his kids were trying to climb out of. “Boys?”•OR just another batfam de-aging au because I love them and I wanted one that had all of my demands so I roped my friend Avian into helping me co-write one!

entry.title: To be apart of Something
entry.summary:
Author: Norbit2plan3t

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,118Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 420

Summary: “Fine,” he whispered, his voice low and cold. “If I’m so impossible, so difficult, then I’ll leave.” He threw the bag over his shoulder and stepped to the window. The night air was crisp as he pushed it open, the cool breeze brushing against his face. He hesitated, just for a moment.A part of him wondered if anyone would even notice. Jason’s words echoed one final time. "No one is coming for you." Then again. "No one loves you." With a steady breath, Damian stepped onto the ledge. He didn’t look back. His mother had made it clear, he wasn’t meant to need anyone. To want anyone. Dependency was weakness. However, Manor, it was different. Or it was supposed to be anyway. And then he was gone, vanishing into the night like a shadow slipping between the cracks.

entry.title: The Buttered Cat Paradox
entry.summary:
Author: writersagainstwritersblock

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,972Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 207

Summary: “No comment.”“You don’t know what I was going to ask,” Clark said with a hint of a smile. “Maybe I just wanted to congratulate you on catching the Film Freak.”Bruce gave him a flat look.“Or maybe I think I can help.”“With a case of vandalism?”Clark stepped in front of him. “It’s not vandalism and you know it, detective.”“And what makes you say that?”“If it were vandalism it would be something a lot more juvenile. To the point. It wouldn’t claim there were seventeen missing kids. That’s public outcry.”“Is that so?”“That and I tried to do a story on the growing number of homeless children last month and I got shut down. According to the last count, the numbers have been decreasing, but there’s been no change in policies, no extra funding to CPS, or shelters, or even an increase in the number of inmates in the juvenile detention center. So where are they going?” Detective Bruce Wayne may have the highest solve rate in Gotham, but if he wants to solve this case, he’ll need the help of an elusive street kid, and while Dick Grayson always lands on his feet, he usually lands himself right into trouble.

entry.title: Assess and Plan
entry.summary:
Author: mustangisinflames

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,461Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 31

Summary: "Batman was stronger than most but clearly not strong enough: failure recognised, accepted, compartmentalised. Now to step back, reassess, figure out a compensation to work in his favour. He needed an even playing field, something that could reduce a near-god to a mortal - he hesitated to say man, because that was exactly what Superman wasn’t. He was an alien seemingly seeking asylum on Earth, playing pretend as humanity’s protector. There had to be an angle, a hidden agenda, even if Batman couldn’t quite see it currently.Kryptonite. The answer clearly lay there." Batman's concerns are raised after his first interaction with Superman.

entry.title: Like Cats and Dogs
entry.summary:
Author: bajuwa

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 77,635Chapters: 31/32Kudos: 2,002

Summary: In a world where soulmates are represented by animal familiars, Clark wonders if his soulmate is a cat. A literal domesticated feline animal that one could get from the pet store and not just a person with some cat-like personality traits. There’s no other explanation as to why his familiar acts like every single asshole cat meme to ever exist.On the off chance his soulmate is a real human being, well… He would never tell his mother this, she raised him too well, but sometimes Clark wishes his soulmate’s familiar was making him feel just as miserable.---Bruce peels his eyes away from the monitors to look down at the menace on his lap and barely contains a look of disgust. Big blue eyes stare up at him as he rests his chin on Bruce’s thigh, and as their eyes meet, the pathetic, whimpering little whines are replaced by excited huffs, the clickity clack of dancing paws on concrete, and the rhythmic thumping of his tail hitting the leg of the table.Why does it have to be so needy and cuddly all the time?
